PrimEcoSys: Southern Piedmont/Ridge and Valley Upland Depression Swamp
Introduced Upland Vegetation - Perennial Grassland and Forbland
Southern and Central Appalachian Bog and Fen
rBOTUx-y6.memHandModelNotes:
****Hand Modeling: In addition to selected PMU's, intersect Pasture/Hay and successional grassland (selected as AMU's) with wet vegetation and/or NWI and include those intersect pixels also. Notes: slow-flowing water with underlying substrate of soft mud and rock, ACIDIC environment (Bury 1979, Ernst et al. 1994).   ****ALL SELECTED MU's ARE PREDOMINATELY NON-MAPPABLE SMALL PATCH SYSTEMS - NWI's for this species range are fully attributed so we may be able to model this species using NWI data instead. Amy Silvano 6Jul05

All but one primary map unit selected was not mapped (small patch systems). As a result, the original model only identified 334 cells in the predicted distribution. I changed this model to make PMUs out of map units previously selected as AMUs (pasture/hay and the successional grasslands) and added 120 meter exterior buffers on flowing and open water.  I removed hand model selection. MJR 30 October 2007.

Southern and Central Appalachian Bog and Fen
